# Experiment configuration
experiment:
  name: "research_experiment_1"
  description: "Initial research experiment"
  tags: ["research", "baseline"]
  
tracking:
  use_wandb: true
  use_tensorboard: true
  log_every: 10
  save_every: 100
  
model:
  architecture: "gpt"
  vocab_size: 16000
  embedding_dim: 512
  num_layers: 8
  num_heads: 8
  hidden_dim: 2048
  max_seq_length: 512
  dropout: 0.1
  
training:
  batch_size: 2
  learning_rate: 0.0001
  num_epochs: 10
  warmup_steps: 1000
  weight_decay: 0.01
  gradient_clip_norm: 1.0
  use_mixed_precision: true
  
data:
  max_samples: 10000
  min_length: 50
  max_length: 2048
  validation_split: 0.1
  test_split: 0.1

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Research experiment runner.
"""

import argparse
import yaml
from pathlib import Path

def main():
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Run research experiment')
    parser.add_argument('--config', default='experiment_config.yaml', help='Experiment config file')
    parser.add_argument('--name', help='Experiment name override')
    args = parser.parse_args()
    
    # Load experiment config
    with open(args.config, 'r') as f:
        config = yaml.safe_load(f)
    
    if args.name:
        config['experiment']['name'] = args.name
    
    print(f"Starting experiment: {config['experiment']['name']}")
    print(f"Description: {config['experiment']['description']}")
    
    # TODO: Implement experiment logic
    print("Experiment completed!")

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
